channel.title: Offshore Webhosting Question
channel.description:
I want to make a website where you can upload full movies to it, but I live in the USA and its illegal to do that. So i was looking around and found out u can get Offshore Web Hosting in different places such as Hong Kong with Secure Privacy. I was looking at the Faq on the site and it said some like We Do Not Host Illegal Stuff. But there it isn't illegal. So would I be able to host full movies on there and have me not get in trouble?
If I cant upload full movies there, do you guys know of any other Offshore web hosts that I could on?

item.title: Offshore Webhosting Question
item.dc:creator: @usernamelol .Fusion
item.description:
@usernamelol wrote:

just fuckin go to that one online movie site and embed.

Read full topic

item.title: Offshore Webhosting Question
item.dc:creator: @juju juju
item.description:
@juju wrote:

Pirated movies/software is illegal in every country afaik, it’s just that some countries(China) don’t activly pursue pirates as much as other countries do(USA).

Read full topic

item.title: Offshore Webhosting Question

item.description:
@Gtech_Warriors wrote:

crap… so their aint no way around this?

item.title: Offshore Webhosting Question
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

You can’t just get offshore hosting and then somehow be immune from the law.

If they find out who you are, you’ll still be arrested in the US.

Read full topic

set up a boat or summuts in “no man’s land” and host it from there coz everythin is legal
well not leagal but nothing is illegal
